Pre-Game Insights: Cyprus have only lost one of their last five home games in the UEFA Nations League.
Kosovo have failed to score in four of their last five matches, highlighting their struggles in front of goal.
Cyprus’ recent matches have consistently seen few goals, with their last three competitive fixtures producing under 2.5 goals.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cyprus will welcome Kosovo to Larnaca for their UEFA Nations League clash, following a morale-boosting win against Lithuania.

The stakes are high for both teams, with Cyprus looking to build momentum in the group and Kosovo seeking to regain momentum.
Others: The best bet for this match is under 1.5 goals, with Cyprus’ defensive solidity and Kosovo’s recent attacking struggles suggesting a tight, low-scoring encounter.
